Name: Sliko
About the game: Sliko is a puzzle game inspired by Sokoban . Slide cubes to their designated locations Transparent cube, when you push it against a colored cube it will acquire color. Minimalist game designed and created to deliver a pleasant and great gameplay experience. Features: 30 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity(Can you solve them all? ) Originally composed Soundtracks Beautiful minimalist aesthetic Playable with mouse and keyboard. Isometric and perspective camera modes. Color palette change. Unlimited undo moves.
